content.text:
[@mix](@ye+QM09iPcDJD6YvQYjoQc7sLF/IFhmNbEqgdzQo3lQ=.ed25519) I didn't even think to screenshot, maybe next time!

The "god is nowhere" versus "god is now here" distinction is *perfect*, I'm so happy that you came up with an example of that edge-case. Just because I love how linkable SSB is:

- [follow-up thread on co-ops](%IcSpOA6Y3Xbo0Xr3Y+dvFTJmlgV3JBLAShEEJew2g4k=.sha256)
- [me banging my head against synonymous channels](%K0Fyxn0X9gTLRPtGQ8gjRDUNErwUTfrVgCDCYjEk9N8=.sha256)
- [new markdown renderer, fresh off the press](https://github.com/ssbc/ssb-markdown/pull/24)
- [unified links](%g3hPVPDEO1Aj/uPl0+J2NlhFB2bbFLIHlty+YuqFZ3w=.sha256)
- #scuttle-thread

mentions.name: me banging my head against synonymous channels
